name: Dilip Rajbhar
about: Aspiring Web Developer and Data Scientist with hands-on experience in building responsive web applications and analyzing data-driven insights. Passionate about developing scalable digital solutions and eager to contribute to innovative projects while continuously learning new technologies.

projects.title: NaviRide – Tracking and Ticket Booking App
projects.summary: A full-stack web application for bus tracking, route management and ticket booking in Navi Mumbai. Built with React, Node.js, Express and MongoDB. Hosted on Netlify.

projects.title: Tashitech – IT Services Website
projects.summary: Official website for an IT services company with responsive design, contact forms and performance optimizations. Built with React and Node.js.

experience.details: Built and optimized responsive websites; integrated APIs and collaborated with designers.

experience.company: The Windmill Coffee House And Bistro
experience.details: Supervised operations, trained staff, and maintained high service standards.
